SEARCH
Package smarthome.service

Interface IDeviceService

All Known Implementing Classes:
DeviceServiceImpl
public interface IDeviceService
Service interface for managing devices in a smart home system through RESTful endpoints.

  • Method Summary

    Method

  • Method Details

    • addDeviceToRoom

      Device addDeviceToRoom (DeviceName deviceName, DeviceTypeName deviceType, RoomId roomId)
      Adds a device to a room.
      Parameters:
      deviceName - the name of the device
      deviceType - the type of the device
      roomId - the ID of the room to add the device to
      Returns:
      the added device

    • getDevicesInRoom

      Iterable<Device> getDevicesInRoom (RoomId roomId)
      Retrieves all devices located in a specified room.
      Parameters:
      roomId - the ID of the room to query devices in
      Returns:
      a list of devices in the specified room

    • getDeviceIdsInRoom

      Iterable<DeviceId> getDeviceIdsInRoom (RoomId roomId)
      Retrieves all device IDs located in a specified room.
      Parameters:
      roomId - the ID of the room to query device IDs in
      Returns:
      a list of device IDs in the specified room

    • deactivateDevice

      Device deactivateDevice (DeviceId deviceId)
      Deactivates a specified device.
      Parameters:
      deviceId - the ID of the device to deactivate
      Returns:
      the deactivated device

    • getDevicesBySensorType

      HashMap<String,List<Device>> getDevicesBySensorType() throws IllegalAccessException
      Retrieves devices categorized by their sensor types.
      Returns:
      a HashMap where each key is a sensor type name, and the value is a set of devices that have sensors of that type
      Throws:
      IllegalAccessException - if there is issue accessing sensor data

    • getDeviceById

      Optional<Device> getDeviceById (DeviceId deviceId)
      Retrieves a device by its ID.
      Parameters:
      deviceId - the ID of the device to retrieve
      Returns:
      the device with the specified ID

    • findDeviceIds

      List<DeviceId> findDeviceIds()
      Retrieves all device IDs in the system.
      Returns:
      a list of all device IDs
